source: TEXT_CMNDEFTOMESTONECONVERT_00391_HELP<tab>Seems every other day we stop dealing in this or that type of tomestone. Inevitably, there comes a point when Rowena says that they're not worth the hassle anymore.
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFTOMESTONECONVERT_00391_HELP「」ですって？
あの石なら、売れないからって、ロウェナが取引を止めたわ。
……好事家たちは、すぐに次の「獲物」を見つけるからね。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFTOMESTONECONVERT_00391_TALK_NOT_HAVE<tab>Might be as I still have use for them, though. If you have any you don't need, bring them here and I'll give you something more desirable in exchange.
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFTOMESTONECONVERT_00391_TALK_NOT_HAVE必要なら「」と交換するけど……
「」を持っていないあなたには、
関係のない話だったかしら。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFTOMESTONECONVERT_00391_TALK_Q<tab>Might be as I still have use for them, though. If you have any you don't need, I'll give you something more desirable in exchange.
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFTOMESTONECONVERT_00391_TALK_Q必要なら、あなたの「」を、
「」と交換するわよ？
あんなものでも、私の小遣いくらいにはなるもの。

TEXT_CMNDEFTOMESTONECONVERT_00391_EXCHANGE_Q「」× を
「」× に交換する？

source: TEXT_CMNDEFTOMESTONECONVERT_00391_TALK_NOT_GET<tab>Oh? Looks like your hands are pretty full already.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFTOMESTONECONVERT_00391_TALK_NOT_GET<tab>あなたはこれ以上「<var 28 ((Item)) E80201 /var>」を持てないようね。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFTOMESTONECONVERT_00391_OVERMAX_Q<tab>Warning: You will not be able to receive all <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020302 /var>. Do you still wish to proceed?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFTOMESTONECONVERT_00391_OVERMAX_Q<tab>「<var 28 ((Item)) E80201 /var>」の所持上限を超えてしまいますが、本当に交換しますか？
